UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Effects of a tryptophanyl substitution on the structure and antimicrobial activity of C-terminally truncated gaegurin 4.
Literature.Author: Won HS, Park SH, Kim HE, Hyun B, Kim M, Lee BJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus ATCC 4698(MIC=>200µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 1021(MIC=>200µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=>200µg/ml),Shigella dysenteriae ATCC 9752(MIC=>200µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=>200µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=>200µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>200µg/ml),Serratia marcescens(MIC=>200µg/ml)
